message: Norry!  Nooorryyyy!

replies.text: Hush! Don't make such noise with all these monsters around!
Who is Norry?

message: Norry is my little doggie. He fell down the steep slope and has not found his way back yet.

replies.text: Oh dear.
A dog! He will be back soon... I better go now.
I have seen a great wolfhound down there a short while ago. But you say you are missing a little doggie.

message:
I can see these Gornauds myself. That's why I must find Norry urgently.
Nooorryyyy!

replies.text: Who is Norry?

message: Please help to find Norry. He is my only friend, and he is helpless without me.

replies.text: How can I help you?
The wolfhound down there had brown fur with a white patch on the breast. He was enjoying himself gnawing some huge bones.

message: This must be him! Go and get him here - be quick!

replies.text: That would be of no use. This brute had attacked me, so I had to kill it.
This brute growled at me, but I got away unharmed.
Eh, I have to leave.

message:
[Hettar fell on the floor]
Nooo! What did you do?!
Please go down there and look for my doggie. Maybe he is injured? Bring him back! You must!

replies.text: OK, I'll do it.
This brute attacked me, so I had to kill it.
Eh, I have to leave.

message: Great! Go immediately, as long as he might be alive still.

replies.text: I hope he will follow me.
I hope he will follow me.
I have no time just now. I'll be back soon.

message: I gave you my last piece of Wyrm meat for Norry. Did you lose it?
Good that you have mentioned it. I'll give you a nice raw piece of Wyrm meat that I have as food for Norry. He loves them.
I can read it in your face - there is no hope for Norry.

replies.text: This brute attacked me, so I had to kill it.
This brute growled at me, but I got away and let it live.
I am still searching.

message: Haha! You know what? Norry has come back all alone! You have made all the way down unnecessarily.

replies.text: Now guess who had persuaded him to do so? He was absorbed by a pile of monster bones.

message: Oh. Thank you then.
Thank you again a thousand times for rescuing my little Norry!

My poor Norry! Why did you have to die so young?
* Sob *

replies.text: N

message: Go away! I hate you!
You see several huge bones of a monstrous skeleton. Good that this creature is dead now and not attacking you.

replies.text: Take the bones.
Leave the bones where they are.

message: GROWL!

replies.text:
The wolfhound doesn't want you to take 'his' bones.
Take them nevertheless.
Leave the bones where they are.

message: Growl!

replies.text: Hey Norry, look here! I have some much better food for you from Hettar.
Hey Norry, look here! I have a Wyrm steak for you from Hettar.
Now run to Hettar! He is waiting for you.
OK, I go. Stupid dog.

message: The wolfhound fetched the meat from your hand and devoured it greedily in a few seconds.

replies.text: There, there. And now run to Hettar! He is waiting for you.

message: A moment later the huge wolfhound was gone.
Grrrowl.

replies.text: Ah, I see. These monstrous bones here on the ground are delicious too.

message: Growl!
